content: आलोक् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To see, perceive, behold; त्वन्मार्गमालोकते <ls>S. D.</ls>; अथालुलोके तपोवनं <ls>Bk. 2. 24</ls>; used in an astrological sense also. {@--2@} To consider, regard, contemplate; तृणमिब जगज्जालमालोकयामः <ls>Bh. 3. 66.</ls> {@--3@} To express congratulations, greet; इति वीरलोक आलोकयितुं प्रवृत्तः <ls>Ve. 4.</ls>
